mapper.insert: insert into bi_workspace_member(workspace_id, username, `level` ,sys_role_id, join_time) values( #{workspaceId}, #{username}, #{level}, #{sysRoleId}, now() )
mapper.update: update bi_workspace_member set `level` = #{level}, sys_role_id = #{sysRoleId} where id = #{id}
update bi_workspace_member set deleted = id where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bi_workspace_member where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and deleted = 0
select from bi_workspace_member where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and `level` = #{level} and deleted = 0
